body_html:
I encountered the same error today! It really confuses me. Now I've solved it thanks to your comment.
I used the COCO dataset to train a PSPNet-50, which has a auxiliary loss. And when training, the net computed the auxiliary result but I didn't add it to the loss. Then I got this same error. Once I add this auxiliary loss into the total loss, the error disappeared.
body_text:
I encountered the same error today! It really confuses me. Now I've solved it thanks to your comment.
I used the COCO dataset to train a PSPNet-50, which has a auxiliary loss. And when training, the net computed the auxiliary result but I didn't add it to the loss. Then I got this same error. Once I add this auxiliary loss into the total loss, the error disappeared.
body:
I encountered the same error today! It really confuses me. Now I've solved it thanks to your comment. 
I used the COCO dataset to train a PSPNet-50, which has a auxiliary loss. And when training, the net computed the auxiliary result but I didn't add it to the loss. Then I got this same error. Once I add this auxiliary loss into the total loss, the error disappeared.
